sentences.en: Do not permit children to indulge in superfluities until esqsentials are met.
sentences.cn: 在孩子们未抓住要点之前别让他们过于注意细节.

sentences.en: Don't indulge in rich sauces, fried food and thick pastry as these are high in fat.
sentences.cn: 不要吃太多浓酱汁、油炸食品和甜腻的油酥点心，因为这些食品的脂肪含量很高。

sentences.en: Everyone should indulge in fantasy on occasion.
sentences.cn: 每个人都应偶尔沉浸在想像之中.

sentences.en: He did not agree with indulging children.
sentences.cn: 他不同意娇惯孩子。

sentences.en: He returned to Britain so that he could indulge his passion for football...
sentences.cn: 他重返英国，为的是可以尽情释放自己对足球的激情。

sentences.en: He returned to Ohio so that he could indulge his passion for football.
sentences.cn: 他重返俄亥俄以释放自己对足球的激情。

sentences.en: His mother spoiled him, indulging his every whim.
sentences.cn: 他母亲对他纵容娇惯，百依百顺。

sentences.en: I must indulge my feelings; I so seldom have had an opportunity of doing so.
sentences.cn: 我得放纵一下我的感情; 我难得有机会这样做.

sentences.en: I'll stick around to indulge your obsession.
sentences.cn: 我会继续呆在这里只为了满足你的执着.

sentences.en: It was imprudent for France to indulge this trait when she was so grievously weakened.
sentences.cn: 法国在遭到如此严重削弱的关头,便犯这种脾气,那是很轻率的事.

sentences.en: It was not the old man to indulge in elaborate preliminaries.
sentences.cn: 这位老人向来不做那种煞费苦心的开场白.

sentences.en: It's the last extravagance we'll be able to indulge in this year.
sentences.cn: 这是我今年所能买的最后一件奢侈品.

sentences.en: Only rarely will she indulge in a glass of wine.
sentences.cn: 她只是偶尔才喝杯红酒，让自己享受一下。

sentences.en: Ray has enough money to indulge his taste for expensive wines.
sentences.cn: 雷有足够的钱来尽情享受高档葡萄酒。

sentences.en: They indulge in tall talk.
sentences.cn: 他们一味说大话.

sentences.en: They indulge their child too much; it's bad for his character.
sentences.cn: 他们过分纵容孩子, 这对孩子的性格有不良影响.

sentences.en: They went into town to indulge in some serious shopping.
sentences.cn: 他们进城去大肆购物。

sentences.en: This is no time to indulge in sarcasm.
sentences.cn: 现在可不是一味讽刺挖苦的时候.

sentences.en: Those who are overweight or indulge in high-salt diets are candidates for hypertension.
sentences.cn: 体重偏高或口味偏咸者易患高血压。

sentences.en: You can indulge yourself without spending a fortune.
sentences.cn: 你不必花大把钱就可以好好犒劳一下自己。

trans.tran_en: to let someone have or do whatever they want, even if it is bad for them
If you indulge in something or if you indulge yourself, you allow yourself to have or do something that you know you will enjoy

trans.tran_cn: 迁就，纵容，使满足，使（自己）沉溺于，使快乐
trans.tran_en: to let someone have or do whatever they want, even if it is bad for them
